content: I”m currently a PhD student at the University of Graz, doing research on the economics of climate change, focusing mainly on mitigation, dabbling in impacts and adaptation occasionally. I like to use R. Maybe someday I’ll switch to Python but I doubt it.

title: Keith Williges
Making concentrated solar power competitive with coal: The costs of a European feed-in tariff
